forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers this morning with mostly cloudy conditions during the afternoon hours. High around 20C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 68F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 11C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 51F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms in the morning will give way to steady rain in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms in the morning will give way to steady rain in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 16C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 61F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 8C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 47F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with light rain in the morning...then becoming partly cloudy. High near 15C. Winds NNW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early. A mix of sun and clouds in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear. Low 6C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 43F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with lots of sunshine. High around 15C. Winds NNW at 30 to 50 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies with gusty winds. High around 60F. Winds NNW at 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Gusty winds early. Low 7C. N winds at 30 to 50 km/h, decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Gusty winds diminishing after midnight. Low 44F. N winds at 20 to 30 mph, decreasing to 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 16C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 59F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with a few showers later at night. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing late. Low 46F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High around 15C. SW winds shifting to NNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 59F. SW winds shifting to NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 7C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 45F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 16C. Winds NNW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 62F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 8C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 47F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 18C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 64F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 8C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 47F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 62F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 8C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 46F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.
